results.content: Very helpful course. There were a couple of niggly issues with the presentation - for example one of the videos is blank after about 2 mins. Also, it would have been nice to see the resulting database structure but this course has helped me with creating my API and having a better understanding of what' going on. I tried a few other courses and this was by far the better one. It could have done with some info on using passport especially http-bearer which I am now trying to work out!
results.content_html: Very helpful course. There were a couple of niggly issues with the presentation - for example one of the videos is blank after about 2 mins. Also, it would have been nice to see the resulting database structure but this course has helped me with creating my API and having a better understanding of what' going on. I tried a few other courses and this was by far the better one. It could have done with some info on using passport especially http-bearer which I am now trying to work out!
